title: Joanna Gruesome's 'Peanut Butter' Rises Above The Band's Gimmicky Name
teaser: The Welsh band's name is a play on that of singer-songwriter Joanna Newsom. Ken Tucker likens the group's second album to a high-wire act accompanied by "furiously strummed punk-rock guitar chords."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
